Text.Value: Master. You are the chosen one.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The butler appears, delighted at your victory

Text.Value: Then there is no escaping my fate.
Your life is mine. Accept your inheritance, or I will reclaim it.
My Chosen. My Slayer. Violence incarnate. You will become a testament in blood.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The skull symbol's eyes brighter, bathing the room in ember red light. The player stumbles as though struck in the head, stricken with pain. The player opens their eyes slowly, they too are glowing in the same color as the skull's eyes.
EditorData.NodeContext: The slightest hint of approval/affection on the "My Chosen. My slayer."

Text.Value: My Slayer. You will grow stronger. Crueller. The prime incarnation of murder.
But you live, and her blood is returned to me. You are my Chosen.
I accept, Father.
I accept your gift, Lord Bhaal.
*For a moment, the brine-pool of your brain clears. To die: to rest, to save the world from yourself. To accept: to become his prophet - in any disobedience, subject to his lash.*
I refuse. I will be free of you.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [BUTLER] Explodes in gore...replaced by the Avatar of Bhaal., [BHAAL] Explodes out of the Butler.<CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
The butler levitates, held up in the air like a broken marionette on invisible strings. Daggers manifest in the air around him and plunge into his body, making a gory pincusion of him. His mutilated corpse crashes to the ground, and the blood that runs from it forms a dark pool.

A light glows within the pool, and within the reflection, we see the Bhaal Temple - the eyes of the skull light with flame within the reflection, and a figure moves out of the darkness toward the surface of the pool, where it connects to reality. It is the butler, his hat gone, the flesh peeled back from his skull in places. Thoroughly mutilated and disfigured. His eyes burn with unholy fire - he has become an Avatar of Bhaal.

Text.Value: This is not my purpose. I will choose my own path.
I understand now. In your name, Father, it will be done.
I don't need any of this. The only family I know are those who fight by my side.
You must destroy this world. It is what you were made for.
You will feel my hunger. My craving. Never to be satisfied.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player's face contorts - whether struggling against their immobility, or feeling the urge Bhaal describees - we cannot say.

Text.Value: I will make another who is worthy.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [PLAYER] cont'd...they collapse dead on the floor. <CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player drops to their knees, and then invisible forces raise them into the air, as happened to the butler. The pool of blood loses its reflection right after Bhaal speaks his final words in this node.

Text.Value: Go, child of Bhaal. Claim the crown of Karsus, control the Absolute, and command a horde fit to butcher this world in my name.

EditorData.AnimationTags: *REUSE*[PLAYER] Inhales deeply, accepting the gift.<CodyM: we can have the player settling after the previous anim for this beat if needed.>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: All light is extinguished. The player's face emerges from the darkness, the same rotten glow flickering across their face as they give a cruel smile.

Text.Value: You were made to conquer. To devour.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [PLAYER] touches finger to nose as blood begins to drain from them...con'td. <CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Bhaal's eyes turn to fury. The player puts a hand to their nose, and sees blood on their fingers. Blood starts to trickle, then surge from their nose, eyes, ears. Jagged cuts open on their exposed skin. They are being drained.

Text.Value: An impotent Urge for a wasted Chosen. When you succumb, I will create another.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player continues to struggle. Bhaal allows the faintest smile to cross his lips. When he finishes speaking, the reflection fades.
EditorData.NodeContext: Ominous - alluding to Bhaal's future return

Text.Value: Never. I'd rather die.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: A tragic beat on the player's face, terrified, as knives manifest in the air around them. Cut to black as the flesh-cutting sounds begin.

Text.Value: The Slayer form will be yours. Made crueller. Stronger. The prime incarnation of murder.
No god gives selflessly. What do you ask in return?
I don't have a choice, it seems. This is what I am.
I have no desire to harm anyone else.
What gift does the Lord of Murder propose?
Every night you can posses me, my friends' lives are in danger. I will not stand for that.
Bow your head.
He is near... He comes for you.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The butler smiles, his body beginning to vibrate, and jerk strangely. The light in the room flickers, as an evil wind begins to blow. The party looks around, uncertain.
EditorData.NodeContext: Butler's body beginning to vibrate, and jerk strangely

Text.Value: I'm honoured, Father. I accept your gift.
*A gift from your god, your Father. An offering of his affection for you, or confirmation that he owns you.*
*Accept Father's gift and you will reap horrors upon this world. But you will be his puppet. This is your final chance to cut your strings...*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: A tragic beat on the player's face, terrified, as knives manifest in the air around them. Cut to black as the flesh-cutting sounds begin.
The Dark Urge walks toward the pool of blood, peering down at the Avatar of Bhaal within

Text.Value: I need no further gifts. You have tainted me enough.
You see at last.
You are my spawn. Your veins course with my unholy blood.
Child of slaughter. I come to give you your inheritance.
I'd rather die.
You were not strong enough, child.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The avatar of Bhaal speaks from within the pool, and the Dark Urge's corpse levitates, hanging like a broken marionette

Text.Value: What would you have me do with this gift?
*It seems impossible to stand against your Father. But you have fought this long against your nature - there might just be a way...*
I live to serve your will, Father. I accept your gift.
He is near... He comes for you.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The butler smiles, his body beginning to vibrate, and jerk strangely. The light in the room flickers, as an evil wind begins to blow. The party looks around, uncertain.
EditorData.NodeContext: Butler's body beginning to vibrate, and jerk strangely

Text.Value: I obey, Father. This world will be eviscerated.
I'd rather die than live in your bloody image.
I expected the other.

EditorData.stateContext: Avatar of Bhaal speaking from within the blood 'reflection', DU looking down into reflection

Text.Value: You will live. My blood will thicken in your veins.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player's eyes snap open, flitting wildly as the player realises they have no control of their body

Text.Value: Oh my failed Master. My heart has never known such sorrow... Now, it breaks.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The Butler stands over the Dark Urge's corpse, mourning, begins to shake as his heart is literally going to break in a couple nodes.

Text.Value: You refuse me?
Arrogance.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The light flickers in the room - Bhaal is getting annoyed.

Text.Value: I've defied you before. You cannot force me to do this.
I have no need of such a power.

EditorData.stateContext: player no longer looking into pool as their death sequence begins

Text.Value: I will extinguish you.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [BUTLER] Explodes in gore...replaced by the Avatar of Bhaal., [BHAAL] Explodes out of the Butler.<CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
The butler levitates, held up in the air like a broken marionette on invisible strings. Daggers manifest in the air around him and plunge into his body, making a gory pincusion of him. His mutilated corpse crashes to the ground, and the blood that runs from it forms a dark pool.

A light glows within the pool, and within the reflection, we see the Bhaal Temple - the eyes of the skull light with flame within the reflection, and a figure moves out of the darkness toward the surface of the pool, where it connects to reality. It is the butler, his hat gone, the flesh peeled back from his skull in places. Thoroughly mutilated and disfigured. His eyes burn with unholy fire - he has become an Avatar of Bhaal.

Text.Value: I have a gift for you, Child. You will use it to lacerate this world.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The avatar of Bhaal holds out his hand. The eyes glow on the symbol of Bhaal carved from the cave wall behind the avatar. The non-reflected symbol in front of the player mimics this behavior.

Text.Value: Domination. Slaughter. Mountains of corpses, you standing atop them.
My apologies, Father. Of course I accept.
You reject my blood, and so I will reclaim it.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [PLAYER]cont'd...they fall to their knees, barely conscious...cont'd.<CodyM>
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player falls to their knees, losing consciousness.The blood runs away from them along carved grooves in the floor. It flows into the pool, pouring down into the reflected image of Bhaal and baptising him

Text.Value: What happens if I refuse?
A creature of destruction, made to devour. You lost your appetite.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player's corpse still hangs.

Synopsis:
Orin, Chosen of Bhaal, has died by the DarkUrge's/party's hands.

If the DU deafted Orin, Bhaal will celebrate his new Chosen and force a decision on them - accept him, or he will reclaim his blood from them.

If the player was defeated, the player sees a linear scene where Bhaal inflicts his blood on them, leaving them with the urge to kill, but not his slayer powers.
